statements: SELECT * FROM verified_nodes ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT node_name, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT node_id, node_name, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = FALSE ORDER BY node_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = true ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_id > 100 AND ip_address LIKE '192.%';
SELECT node_name, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE ip_address IN ('192.168.1.1', '10.0.0.1') ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE '%server%' OR ip_address LIKE '%192%' AND is_verified = false;
SELECT node_id, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = true ORDER BY node_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_name, node_id FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = FALSE;
SELECT node_id, node_name, is_verified FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = TRUE ORDER BY node_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT node_id, node_name FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_id < 5 ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT node_id, node_name, participation_date FROM verified_nodes JOIN network_participation ON verified_nodes.node_id = network_participation.node_id WHERE verified_nodes.is_verified = FALSE;

SELECT node_id, node_name, participation_date FROM verified_nodes JOIN network_participation ON verified_nodes.node_id = network_participation.node_id WHERE participation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY participation_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_nodes, AVG(node_id) AS avg_node_id FROM verified_nodes WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM VerifiedNodes;
SELECT node_name, public_key FROM VerifiedNodes;
SELECT participant_name, node_id FROM NetworkParticipants ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT node_id, status, last_checked FROM NodeStatus WHERE status='active';
SELECT node_name, public_key FROM VerifiedNodes WHERE node_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM VerifiedNodes WHERE node_id = 1;
SELECT node_name, public_key FROM VerifiedNodes WHERE node_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY node_id DESC;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, node_name FROM NetworkParticipants INNER JOIN VerifiedNodes ON NetworkParticipants.node_id = VerifiedNodes.node_id;
SELECT node_id, COUNT(*) AS total_participants FROM NetworkParticipants GROUP BY node_id HAVING total_participants > 2;
SELECT node_id, status, last_checked FROM NodeStatus WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes;
SELECT node_name, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT id, node_name FROM verified_nodes ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM node_contacts WHERE contact_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT node_id, activity_type, activity_date FROM node_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT node_name, ip_address, public_key FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE '%node%';
SELECT * FROM node_history ORDER BY verification_date DESC;
SELECT node_name, count(node_id) FROM verified_nodes JOIN node_history ON verified_nodes.id = node_history.node_id GROUP BY node_name;
SELECT node_name, activity_type, activity_description FROM verified_nodes JOIN node_activity ON verified_nodes.id = node_activity.node_id WHERE activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes;
SELECT node_name, ip_address, status FROM verified_nodes WHERE status='Active';
SELECT node_name, ip_address, status FROM verified_nodes ORDER BY node_name DESC;
SELECT node_name, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT node_id, node_name, ip_address, status FROM verified_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE '%node%';
SELECT * FROM verified_nodes WHERE status='Active';
SELECT node_name, ip_address FROM verified_nodes WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT node_name, log_time FROM verified_nodes JOIN node_logs ON verified_nodes.node_id = node_logs.node_id;
SELECT node_name, connection_type FROM verified_nodes JOIN node_connections ON verified_nodes.node_id = node_connections.node_id WHERE connection_status='Connected';
SELECT node_name, security_level FROM verified_nodes JOIN node_security ON verified_nodes.node_id = node_security.node_id WHERE security_level='High';
